entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
